mapper.select: SELECT /* RetrieveUserInfoList */ USER_ID AS "userID" , ROLE_ID AS "roleID" , SPEC_ID AS "specificID" , FRST_NM AS "firstName" , LAST_NM AS "lastName" , NICK_NM AS "nickName" , GENDER AS "gender" , DOB AS "dateOfBirth" , POB AS "placeOfBirth" , ADDR AS "address" , PHONE AS "phone" , EMAIL AS "email" , PASSWD AS "passwd" , IMG_URL AS "imageUrl" , STCD AS "statusCode" FROM FRST.USER_INFO WHERE (FRST_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR LAST_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR NICK_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR PHONE ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%') AND ('' = COALESCE(#{roleID}, '') OR ROLE_ID = #{roleID}) AND ('' = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') OR STCD = #{statusCode}) AND STCD <> '02' ORDER BY (FRST_REG_DT,FRST_REG_TIME) DESC , ROLE_ID DESC , SPEC_ID DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

WITH FilteredUsers AS ( SELECT * FROM FRST.USER_INFO WHERE (FRST_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR LAST_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR NICK_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR PHONE ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%') AND ('' = COALESCE(#{roleID}, '') OR ROLE_ID = #{roleID}) AND ('' = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') OR STCD = #{statusCode}) AND STCD <> '02' ) SELECT /* RetrieveUserInfoTotalCount */ COUNT(*) AS "totalCount" , SUM(CASE WHEN GENDER = 'M' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "totalMale" , SUM(CASE WHEN GENDER = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "totalFemale" FROM FilteredUsers

SELECT /* RetrieveUserInfoListForDownload */ USER_ID AS "userID" , ROLE_ID AS "roleID" , SPEC_ID AS "specificID" , FRST_NM AS "firstName" , LAST_NM AS "lastName" , NICK_NM AS "nickName" , GENDER AS "gender" , DOB AS "dateOfBirth" , POB AS "placeOfBirth" , ADDR AS "address" , PHONE AS "phone" , EMAIL AS "email" , PASSWD AS "passwd" , IMG_URL AS "imageUrl" , STCD AS "statusCode" FROM FRST.USER_INFO WHERE (FRST_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR LAST_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR NICK_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR PHONE ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%') AND ('' = COALESCE(#{roleID}, '') OR ROLE_ID = #{roleID}) AND ('' = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') OR STCD = #{statusCode}) AND STCD <> '02' ORDER BY (FRST_REG_DT,FRST_REG_TIME) DESC , ROLE_ID DESC , SPEC_ID DESC

SELECT /* RetrieveUserInfoDetail */ USER_ID AS "userID" , ROLE_ID AS "roleID" , SPEC_ID AS "specificID" , FRST_NM AS "firstName" , LAST_NM AS "lastName" , NICK_NM AS "nickName" , GENDER AS "gender" , DOB AS "dateOfBirth" , POB AS "placeOfBirth" , ADDR AS "address" , PHONE AS "phone" , EMAIL AS "email" , PASSWD AS "passwd" , IMG_URL AS "imageUrl" , FRST_LOGIN_DT AS "firstLoginDate" , LAST_LOGIN_DT AS "lastLoginDate" , PASS_ERR_CT AS "userPasswordErrorCount" , LOCK_DT AS "lockDateTime" , LOGIN_BY_USER_YN AS "loginByUserYn" , STCD AS "statusCode" FROM FRST.USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userID} AND STCD <> '02'
SELECT /* RetrieveUserInfoAllStatus */ USER_ID AS "userID" , ROLE_ID AS "roleID" FROM FRST.USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userID}
mapper.update: UPDATE /* UpdateUserInfo */ FRST.USER_INFO SET FRST_NM = COALESCE(#{firstName}, FRST_NM) , LAST_NM = COALESCE(#{lastName}, LAST_NM) , NICK_NM = COALESCE(#{nickName}, NICK_NM) , GENDER = COALESCE(#{gender}, GENDER) , DOB = COALESCE(#{dateOfBirth}, DOB) , POB = COALESCE(#{placeOfBirth}, POB) , ADDR = COALESCE(#{address}, ADDR) , PHONE = COALESCE(#{phone}, PHONE) , EMAIL = COALESCE(#{address}, EMAIL) , STCD = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, STCD) , LAST_CHNG_DT = COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, LAST_CHNG_DT) , LAST_CHNG_TIME = COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, LAST_CHNG_TIME) WHERE USER_ID = #{userID} AND SPEC_ID = #{specificID}

UPDATE /* UpdateUserLoginInfo */ FRST.USER_INFO SET PASS_ERR_CT = COALESCE(#{userPasswordErrorCount}, PASS_ERR_CT) , STCD = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, STCD) , LOCK_DT = COALESCE(#{lockDateTime}, LOCK_DT) , FRST_LOGIN_DT = COALESCE(#{firstLoginDate}, FRST_LOGIN_DT) , LAST_LOGIN_DT = COALESCE(#{lastLoginDate}, LAST_LOGIN_DT) , LOGIN_BY_USER_YN = COALESCE(#{loginByUserYn}, LOGIN_BY_USER_YN) , PASSWD = COALESCE(#{newPassword}, PASSWD) , SPEC_ID = COALESCE(#{specificID}, SPEC_ID) , LAST_CHNG_DT = COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, LAST_CHNG_DT) , LAST_CHNG_TIME = COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, LAST_CHNG_TIME) WHERE USER_ID = #{userID} AND ROLE_ID = #{roleID}

UPDATE /* UpdateUserInfoResetPassword */ FRST.USER_INFO SET USER_ID = COALESCE(#{newUserID}, USER_ID) , PASSWD = COALESCE(#{newUserPasword}, PASSWD) , PASS_ERR_CT = COALESCE(#{userPasswordErrorCount}, PASS_ERR_CT) , STCD = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, STCD) , LOCK_DT = COALESCE(#{lockDateTime}, LOCK_DT) , FRST_LOGIN_DT = COALESCE(#{firstLoginDate}, FRST_LOGIN_DT) , LAST_LOGIN_DT = COALESCE(#{lastLoginDate}, LAST_LOGIN_DT) , LOGIN_BY_USER_YN = COALESCE(#{loginByUserYn}, LOGIN_BY_USER_YN) , LAST_CHNG_DT = COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, LAST_CHNG_DT) , LAST_CHNG_TIME = COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, LAST_CHNG_TIME) WHERE USER_ID = #{userID} AND ROLE_ID = #{roleID}
mapper.insert: INSERT /* registerUserInfoDetail */ INTO FRST.USER_INFO ( USER_ID , ROLE_ID , SPEC_ID , FRST_NM , LAST_NM , NICK_NM , GENDER , DOB , POB , ADDR , PHONE , EMAIL , PASSWD , IMG_URL , PASS_ERR_CT , FRST_LOGIN_DT , LAST_LOGIN_DT , LOGIN_BY_USER_YN , LOCK_DT , STCD , FRST_REG_DT , FRST_REG_TIME , LAST_CHNG_DT , LAST_CHNG_TIME) VALUES ( #{userID} , #{roleID} , COALESCE(#{specificID}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstName}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastName}, '') , COALESCE(#{nickName}, '') , COALESCE(#{gender}, '') , COALESCE(#{dateOfBirth}, '') , COALESCE(#{placeOfBirth}, '') , COALESCE(#{address}, '') , COALESCE(#{phone}, '') , COALESCE(#{email}, '') , COALESCE(#{passwd}, '') , COALESCE(#{imageUrl}, '') , COALESCE(#{userPasswordErrorCount}, 0) , COALESCE(#{firstLoginDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastLoginDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{loginByUserYn}, '') , COALESCE(#{lockDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterTime}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, ''))
